website_summaries.verdict: This 62-inch round beach towel is big enough to share and available in 24 vibrant and cheerful colors and patterns.
pros: Multipurpose use as a yoga mat, picnic mat, tablecloth, or bedspread
Comes with a 30-day money back guarantee from manufacturer
cons: Although absorbent, it is thinner than some buyers expected

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, thicker than others, but not as plush as some beach towels. It is exactly what was expected. Would reccomend this product. Good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Jhritz2000

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Beach Blanket
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is perfect, it's a nice thick towel material, perfect, bought this towel with intentions of tie-dying it, it is 100% cotton, the dye does not stay in the towel at all but it is still a very nice towel
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Neese

customer_reviews.title: Towel in the round
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful round of color. Was hoping for a thicker towel fabric but this will certainly do the job. One will certainly be able to spot it on a sandy beach among hundreds of other towels.
customer_reviews.author: cabby

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. I didn't want the thin shawl like type so bought this one instead. I wouldn't say this is super thick, just regular beach towel material which is just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful casual beach towel!
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful in person! Perfect for the beach. Very lightweight and thin as expected.
customer_reviews.author: marcos silva

customer_reviews.title: Love love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love it!! It's huge!! Wash it before first use and it absorbes like a towel and its an awesome beach towel!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, perfect size for the beach! You can even use as a blanket! Definitely will purchase another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super cute!
customer_reviews.text: this is so adorable and great quality! It is nice and soft and thick
customer_reviews.author: amanda b

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Blanket Towel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this towel for my 5yr daughter. She loves flamingos! The quality is great, washes well (line dried), and is great for pool or play. Even a nice blanket! Definitely will purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: I may have to move a lot in the future so this is perfect. I will say that it does slide on ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a carpet in the center of my room. I may have to move a lot in the future so this is perfect. I will say that it does slide on hardwood floor. If you have carpet it may not move as much. I love the color and print that I got, it's Color 02. It's cute and is as described. If you want something thicker than a really thin towel than you should look elsewhere. It compacts really nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Chen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Much thicker than I expected. Good quality for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials with great workmanship
customer_reviews.text: The material is definitely top quality and the workmanship looks great. When you touched it you definitely get the quality feeling: the knitting and weaving is very meticulous. It is thick. We bought some other round towel before with comparable price in local store but the material was much thinner and workmanship poorer.
customer_reviews.author: Q.Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This rounder is thick, and has a beautiful pattern! I will definitely purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: Bill P

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not thick
customer_reviews.text: Good material and very beautiful, it's a very good beach blanket, cover or even home decoration; but would be a little bit thin for a beach towel.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant and Soft
customer_reviews.text: I really like this towel! It fits my purposes well. It is vibrant and looks great in pictures, I like to use it as a beach towel and I find it soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: I love this towel
customer_reviews.text: I love this towel. Nice and luxurious and af un look for the beach. Large enough to sit on with some extra stuff around.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute towel! Haven’t seen how it holds up yet as this is a gift for my mother but I think she’s going to love it since it has the Parrot Head vibe.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much that I bought another one, and using for a round outdoor patio table by the pool, added a hot pink umbrella and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Best Round Beach towel,Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful towel, looks like new no matter how many times you wash and dry it!
customer_reviews.author: suzie c

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was purchased as a gift. appears to be exactly what was ordered
customer_reviews.author: Joel W.

customer_reviews.title: MICROFIBER
customer_reviews.text: It's a microfiber material, not towel material. Kinda weird! I just know like all other microfiber rags I've thrown away, grass and things are going to stick to this like crazy! Not worth the money. I would return it but the print is so cute lol. Maybe ill just keep it inside and not take it out.
customer_reviews.author: Ckdub

customer_reviews.title: It is midweight at best. Walmart carries a thicker one for $19
customer_reviews.text: This was described as Thick Thick Thick. It is midweight at best. Walmart carries a thicker one for $19.99
customer_reviews.author: Diane Quertermous

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not thick but still happy with i!
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty / thick? Not so much but it is perfect for the beach because it is not thick. I love it but i was expecting “thick plush” and it is not close. But i know my beach towels and this one will shake sand out and dry quicker so im a silver lining type of person! I love it anyway! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Truthfulreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality beach towel
customer_reviews.text: Ordered several as gifts for kids. Good quality beach towel, on the thin side. The kiwi print did not look as good (colors were not as vibrant) compared to the watermelon print one from the same company.
customer_reviews.author: KAI

customer_reviews.title: A Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: This towel is VERY thin; it is even more thin than I had anticipated after reading the reviews. I did keep it ... but only because I purchased it for my 11-year-old granddaughter's birthday. She'll have fun with it for a while for the rest of the summer, but it won't keep her very warm after swimming. I'm relatively certain that it will find it's way to the trash bin at summer's end.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cupas

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice size and thickness
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice size and thickness, but be aware that the pattern with the monstera leaf, looks like it should be more aqua/light teal leaves with splashes of white and pink, but the leaves are actually very very green. Grass green.I'm keeping it, but aqua/teal would have matched better with my stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Intellectual Romantic

customer_reviews.title: No Good
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as a towel so I'm a bit confused as to why I received almost a twin size, VERY thin, non-absorbant piece of micro-fiber material. It's the kind of material that dry skin roughs on to. I am not happy with this product & I think I'll give it to my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I'm skeptical of all the high reviews
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. Looks nice, good size. Fine for lying on beach or just to wrap up in for cover. But won't dry you at all. 0 absorbency whatsoever. Just kind of moves water around and you can't even slide it over wet skin. If you don't want it for drying, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: CMV

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect beach towel. Not thin sheet material. Towel materIal.
customer_reviews.author: Jessdykes

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cute
customer_reviews.text: Just got this for the beach an I like it works pretty good an it’s pretty cute an Easy to see from the water line an it dryer me pretty well too an it’s soft so that’s a pulse I hope to use it many more times at the beach
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit two people!
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit two people! I'm 5'0 and my feet was still handing off. If you are sitting and not laying down then yes two people's bums will fit. I ended up buying a beach tent so this will work, but as far as a beach towel for one or two people your head or feet will hang out. And after I purchased this, I saw other seller selling them for $6 less. Shop around first! Also says you can't machine wash this and only by hand. So strange. Too much of a hassle to return, but I guess it will work.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this towel so much. However it had so many threads that started falling apart. I tried contacting the seller and no luck. Sadly dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Udi Melamed

customer_reviews.title: Not “thick” but nice for a very thin cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice towel but definitely not “thick” in my opinion. I have a pool and I wouldn’t use the as towels because they wouldn’t be absorbent enough!
customer_reviews.author: MsMgmt

customer_reviews.title: Son of a beach
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the design and quality of this beach towel. Feel most things like this have a totally different color when they show up but the teal and baby blue towel is depicted perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R Kneale

customer_reviews.title: Not your average beach towel
customer_reviews.text: Great beach towel---beautiful material! Held up perfect in wash. Would certainly gift this to our beach/pool loving friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Family Adventure Shop

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not great to dry off with
customer_reviews.text: Flamingo lovers will love it for the flamingos , not very soft and gets all those little pitty things of it .
customer_reviews.author: kasey doran

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I initially just wanted something round for my large round sun chair. OMG I AM SO GLAD I BOUGHT THIS. It is exactly as pictured, great quality and amazing price. Definitely purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Thin and not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. I bought two of these because of their larger dimensions. I was willing to pay more since it was larger, but these were so thin. I will say the patterns look very nice and bright but unfortunately the pattern is only on one side. The other side is white. I do not think they are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl h.

customer_reviews.title: Love this towel!
customer_reviews.text: Love this towel! Soaks up water extremely well off of my body/hair after a swim and dries quickly. It’s on the thinner side, but thickness seems irrelevant in terms of how well it soaks up and retains water. Lightweight and folds up smaller than most beach towels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great towl! This washes well, is durable and is very pretty. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jennine T.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors,thin material just ok size
customer_reviews.text: Pretty colors but not as thick as I was expecting and not as large as I expected. They were selling similar towels at Walmart for half the price but doubled the thickness and much larger. This year I'll just get one from there.
customer_reviews.author: M. Monroe

customer_reviews.title: was microfiber when I received it and not comfortable. Print was very cute though
customer_reviews.text: Had to return, was microfiber when I received it and not comfortable. Print was very cute though, looked like the picture. Just wasn’t what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Weird material and not as big as I thought
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a very weird feeling material. It doesn't even feel like other towels. It is also not big enough for an average person to lay out on it with any extra room. I didn't read the size so it might be my fault I just thought it would be bigger. I would have said nothing if it weren't for the feeling of the material.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytee Ihrer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this towel! It’s thin and lightweight but still dries very well
customer_reviews.author: Deniss

customer_reviews.title: Cute enough
customer_reviews.text: Isn’t very absorbent. Only has color on one side. Otherwise design is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: LeahNick

customer_reviews.title: Microfiber sucks
customer_reviews.text: I'll never buy a microfiber towel again, I hated this!
customer_reviews.author: N. G.

customer_reviews.title: Cute print
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a pool towel to match my bathing suit. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this beach towel. Everyone is always asking me where I got it from. Will definitely be buying another one for my daughter, So she’ll stop taking mine. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Jolene derosier

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! And the colors are beautiful.. I thought it would going to be bigger than it is but it’s still big enough for one person to lay down.
customer_reviews.author: Vero Vamee

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I love the larger size, and it is lightweight so it dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: donna cormier

customer_reviews.title: Blanket, not towel.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking more for a beach “towel” than a blanket. A little too thick for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: VBenjamin

customer_reviews.title: super thin
customer_reviews.text: very very very thin. feels weird kind of like micro fiber.
customer_reviews.author: carl l.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS TOWEL! The fabric is very soft but it doesn’t bead water like some soft towels do. I bought this for Florida and it was a the perfect towel to bring to the beach as it has a lot of surface area to keep you out of the sand if need be. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a beach towel on a back ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a beach towel on a back packing trip to Thailand. It was a little too bulky to take backpacking, but I will definitely use it for other adventures!
customer_reviews.author: L. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and washes well
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and washes well, but very thin material. It is advertised as thick, which I think is false advertising. But, because it is attractive, I did keep it.
customer_reviews.author: madgefan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Vibrant Colors
customer_reviews.text: The Blanket/Towel is very colorful but it's thinner than what was expected and smaller. Although, not what I was expecting it's a nice towel, the price was much higher than two others I purchased for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my beach towel. It is as pictured and is good quality. Delivery time was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: So cute and bigger than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and cheap haven’t used it washed yet but it’s cute
customer_reviews.author: nichole lengen

customer_reviews.title: love the look and that its so different from a ...
customer_reviews.text: love the look and that its so different from a regular beach towel. annoying on a beach chair because it won't stay up due to the shape.
customer_reviews.author: blueberry eyes

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: This this towel is so cute and made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mema

customer_reviews.title: Not a Microfiber Towel
customer_reviews.text: It’s cheap and not microfiber. You can buy these at a variety of stores for half the price. It’s very thin for a towel and too bulky for microfiber.
customer_reviews.author: pwag

customer_reviews.title: Water sucker Uppers
customer_reviews.text: Thin but absorbent 🧽 and dry really fast! Great for pool days. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: It.Fitz.me

customer_reviews.title: Will do when in a hurry gathering supplies for vac.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty colors. Hem/stitches appear to be very cheap, guessing I will wash it once & it will be coming apart. Based on the lack of stitching I over paid
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Small.
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. Like the pattern and colors Could do without the fringe
customer_reviews.author: L3

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not thick
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think labeling this towel as “thick” is accurate. It’s actually very thin for a beach towel. It’s pretty and I am going to end up keeping it but I was definitely hoping for something thicker and more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn S

customer_reviews.title: Pineapples: Warmth, welcome, hospitality...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, great quality, soft. We use this at the park all the time.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute, and looks like picture but seems a bit thinner than expected
customer_reviews.author: rottgirl

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzy fabric attaches to everything makes it annoying to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty but the fabric attaches and sticks to everything.. makes it less desirable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Daling

customer_reviews.title: ... a birthday present for my daughter and she really loved
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for my daughter and she really loved it
customer_reviews.author: Debra Brooks McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thick. Quality. Gorgeous design. Will actually be able to use on the beach as a towel.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra J Fortney

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful towel!! Love it! It’s not super thick but just right. And it’s large! Covers very well
customer_reviews.author: Donna Clark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described. It’s soft and good quality! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: The color it not like picture, it’s more green with purple... it’s not to pretty like pictures, but not ugly, its ok
customer_reviews.author: alfonsina

customer_reviews.title: High quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality , beautiful product, comfortable , I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These towels were really nice but the printing was a little dull.
customer_reviews.author: The Windmillers

customer_reviews.title: Thin towel and does not even feel like a terry cloth beach towel at all
customer_reviews.text: Not thick thick thick. Thin towel and does not even feel like a terry cloth beach towel at all.
customer_reviews.author: K Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: So, so quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, but really thin. Colors are muted and not even close to the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Roxane Mammano

customer_reviews.title: Confy
customer_reviews.text: I like it, very comfortable and big , fit the whole fam ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Erika Do vale

customer_reviews.title: A novel idea
customer_reviews.text: Says "thick." Not my idea of thick. Guess I'm paying for the novelty of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best Towel Ive ever bought! So cute! Everyone Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: this thing is POLYESTER
customer_reviews.text: this towel is 100% polyester, though my search was for 100% cotton - it is also quite thin - colors are vivid
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. The quality was awful it was snagged all over and the colors were completely gone throughout and its paper thin. I will be returning and do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Livia

customer_reviews.title: Looks better on picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks better on picture. Very cheaply made in reality, would not want to use it. I liked the style however.
customer_reviews.author: Lamare

customer_reviews.title: Lovedddd!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite towel ever. Took it to the beach with me last summer and will be again this summer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve received lots of compliments on this, it’s a good size and the material is nice and thick.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELINA MURO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s as pretty as it looks!! Gorgeous colors and soft cotton! Love it
customer_reviews.author: C V Alicea

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: The product is pictured with 4 towels but only comes with one. Misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty towel. Not as thick as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty towel. Not as thick as advertised. Ordered with Prime two day shipping. Was supposed to receive the package the day it shipped.
customer_reviews.author: April Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute. I get tons of compliments when I go to the beach or pool!
customer_reviews.author: Colin Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't like it described very thin not up to my liking
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda sauble

customer_reviews.title: The size is nice though.
customer_reviews.text: Quite a bit thinner then i thought it would be. Not sure it’s worth the cost for the quality. The size is nice though.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this towel, so pretty and exactly what I was looking for!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Fits one person
customer_reviews.text: Received on time and it was the size that I expected. Perfect!

customer_reviews.text: The colors in the design are not the same as pictured.

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: not as soft as expected but gets the job done

customer_reviews.title: Product is exactly as described. Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my daughter, she loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beach blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Love this beach blanket! Print is beautiful. Good size and material is nice.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and beautiful! It was just a little on the small side in my opinion.

product_meta.title: Genovega Thick Round Beach Towel Blanket - Fruit Pineapple Large Circle Circular Mat
feature_bullets: ★Dying STANDARD: USA Proposition 65 Standard, Disperse and AZO Free Dying, Eco-friendly.

★SAME PATTERN DIFFERENT QUALITY: Please check our picture, the quality is durable soft terry towel, 100% microfiber. The weight is about 1.2-1.3 lbs (550-580 g), which is slightly thicker than an average towel. It dries off very fast, Just hang it outside for a few minutes and you can quickly use it again
★EXTRA LAGER SIZE: 62 inches in diameter include tassels which fits up for two persons comfortably, the perfect amount of space to share with your lover, child, pet and so on.

★MULTI-PURPOSE: Round Beach Towel, Round Beach Blanket, Round Beach Mat, Round Beach Towel Roundie, Round Beach Tapestry, Round Yoga Towel Mat, Round Beach Picnic Blanket, Round Beach Throw, Round Yoga Carpet, Round Picnic Mat , Round Picnic Blanket, Bed Cover, Tapestry, Table Cloth, Meditation, Poolside Lounging or Wall Hanging.

★QUALITY CHECK: If any issue, please feel free to contact us for a solution. We reply to you in 24 hours, we will try our 200 % efforts to make you 100% satisfy. We listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure quality, fit, and comfort.
